00379 template<typename T>
00380 gaia::base::Vector<T*>* Parcel::createTypedVectorN() const {
00381     int32_t N = readInt();
00382     if (N == -1) {
00383         return NULL;
00384     }
00385     gaia::base::Vector<T*>* l = new gaia::base::Vector<T*>();
00386     T* obj = NULL;
00387     for (int32_t i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00388         if (readInt() != 0) {
00389             obj = T::createFromParcelN(*this);
00390             l->append(obj);
00391         } else {
00392             l->append(NULL);
00393         }
00394     }
00395     return l;
00396 }
00397 
00398 template<typename T>
00399 void Parcel::readTypedVector(gaia::base::Vector<T*>* vec) const {
00400     int32_t M = vec->size();
00401     int32_t N = readInt();
00402     int32_t i = 0;
00403     for (; i < M && i < N; i++) {
00404         if (readInt() != 0) {
00405             vec->replaceAt(T::createFromParcelN(*this), i);
00406         } else {
00407             vec->replaceAt(NULL, i);
00408         }
00409     }
00410     for (; i < N; i++) {
00411         if (readInt() != 0) {
00412             vec->append(T::createFromParcelN(*this));
00413         } else {
00414             vec->append(NULL);
00415         }
00416     }
00417     for (; i < M; i++) {
00418         vec->removeAt(N);
00419     }
00420 }
00421 
00422 template<typename T>
00423 void Parcel::writeTypedVector(const gaia::base::Vector<T*>* vec) {
00424     if (vec != NULL) {
00425         int32_t N = vec->size();
00426         writeInt(N);
00427         for (int32_t i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00428             T* item = (*vec)[i];
00429             if (item != NULL) {
00430                 writeInt(1);
00431                 item->writeToParcel(this, 0);
00432             } else {
00433                 writeInt(0);
00434             }
00435         }
00436     } else {
00437         writeInt(-1);
00438     }
00439 }
